column3: Faculty of Science and Bio-engineering Sciences
column5: The English-taught Master in Chemistry is a two-year (120 ECTS) advanced study in chemistry organised by the Vrije Universiteit Brussel, Belgium. This MSc programme combines the expertise in the different research domains of both the Vrije Universiteit Brussel (VUB) and Ghent University (UGent).The Master of Science in Chemistry provides a broad scientific education and experience in chemical research. It contains scientifically and profession-oriented courses. It is also structured to develop a critical attitude, logical and analytical reasoning skills, and a sense for generalization and abstraction. It is organized to initiate students to research and seek scientific progress.
column7: The tuition fee for 2024-2025 will be: EU/EEA students: 1092 €/year Non EU/EEA students 4000 €/year
